generated_doNotEdit.title: Move Outdoors Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to move outdoors.

fields.title: Goal Radius
fields.description: The radius away from the target block to count as reaching the goal.

fields.title: Search Count
fields.description: The amount of times to try finding a random outdoors position before failing.

fields.title: Search Height
fields.description: The y range to search for an outdoors position for.

fields.title: Search Range
fields.description: The x and z range to search for an outdoors position for.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: The movement speed modifier to apply to the entity while it is moving outdoors.

fields.title: Timeout Cooldown
fields.description: The cooldown time in seconds before the goal can be reused after pathfinding fails

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
